1. Make a new project folder

   ```js
   const fs = require('fs')
   fs.mkdirSync('project')
   ```

1. Initialize a new repository

   ```js
   const repo = { fs, dir: 'project' }
   await git.init(repo)
   ```

1. Create source files

   We can't help you here.
   This part you'll have to do on your own.
